MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK3 postcode area of Grangemouth, affecting properties in Bute Place and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:30pm , this is to remove generators and return properties to mains supply and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:56pm on Tuesday, 02 March 2021
